tool.name: SAGA.climate_tools.21
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayCLIMATE False isArrayATmean False isArrayATmax False isArraySIrel False output_data_PHENOLOGY $output_data_PHENOLOGY output_data_SUMMARY $output_data_SUMMARY name SAGA.climate_tools.21 CLIMATE $CLIMATE ATmean $ATmean ATmax $ATmax SIrel $SIrel LATITUDE $LATITUDE LIMIT $LIMIT DToptimum $DToptimum DTminimum $DTminimum FAminimum $FAminimum DDminimum $DDminimum DDtotal $DDtotal YD_Begin_MIN '$YD_Begin_MIN' YD_End_Onset_MIN '$YD_End_Onset_MIN' YD_End_MIN '$YD_End_MIN' prefer $prefer response $response outputType_PHENOLOGY $OutputSection_PHENOLOGY.outputType_PHENOLOGY transmissionMode_PHENOLOGY $OutputSection_PHENOLOGY.transmissionMode_PHENOLOGY outputType_SUMMARY $OutputSection_SUMMARY.outputType_SUMMARY transmissionMode_SUMMARY $OutputSection_SUMMARY.transmissionMode_SUMMARY

param.name: CLIMATE
param.label: Climate Data
param.help: Climate Data The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ATmean
param.label: Mean Temperature
param.help: Degree Celsius The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ATmax
param.label: Maximum Temperature
param.help: Degree Celsius The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: SIrel
param.label: Solar Irradiation
param.help: Wh/m^2 The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: LIMIT
param.label: Limit
param.help: Limits state output to a maximum value of 1.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_PHENOLOGY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_SUMMARY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: A comprehensive phenology model of Ips typographus (L.) (Col., Scolytinae) as a tool for hazard rating of bark beetle infestation.
